data.name: MasterBuilder
data.description:
To become MasterBuilder you need to acquire all the master artifacts throughout the world. 

MasterBuilder delivers an open-world sandbox experience with endless creation systems and unique physicalities.

Looking for a game that will unleash your creativity and spark your imagination? Look no further than MasterBuilder, a VR sandbox game that lets you build, explore, and experiment to your heart's content!

With its unique procedural generation and terraforming system, MasterBuilder offers an endlessly customizable experience that allows you to craft your very own virtual world with no directions, no goals, and no limits. 

And best of all, MasterBuilder is a game that's great for all ages! Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for a casual, relaxing experience, MasterBuilder offers a sense of curiosity for all. With no time limits, no pressure, and no restrictions, MasterBuilder lets you explore your creativity at your own pace and in your own way.

Enter a world of creativity. Discover the master artifacts scattered throughout the procedurally-generated island sandbox, and unleash your imagination with the unique terraforming and creation systems. With the Day'n'Night Invaders update, experience a dynamic day and night cycle, a new lighting system, and the option of facing off against AI invaders. Create, smash, and adventure your way to becoming the ultimate MasterBuilder.
